data.reddit:
Hello,

My name is Ryan and I’m a 19 year old male with anxiety. Beginning in July at random, I started feeling an intense pressure feeling in my abdomen region. It’s above the belly button up to the center of chest region. Sometimes I might feel it below the navel.

No matter what I eat or drink, I feel bloated after eating anything. I tried looking for things that aggregated it or relieved the sensation, but I can’t find anything. I notice I started having a bowl moment every morning, 5 minutes after waking up for a few weeks now.

I also noticed a liquid sensation in my lower stomach when waking up. It’s strange considering I still feel this liquid after using the bathroom. I have seen a GI and they gave me anti-acids to see if it helps and then suggested an endoscope of the stomach if it didn’t help....which I fear about getting. I’ve also had an abdominal ultrasound recently which came back as normal.

If anybody has any suggestions what this could possibly be, I would appreciate it. I don’t have any nausea, diarrhea, or typical acid reflux symptoms as far as I can tell. It’s just a bloating/pressure feeling. Extremely uncomfortable.

Thank you!
